com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.gameobjects

Interface Renderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntity, AbstractGameObject, AnimatedBlock, BenchmarkBall, Bullet, Cursor, DestructionParticle, EntityBlock, EntityShadow, Explosion, Laserdot, MovableEntity, Particle, ParticleEmitter, PointLightSource, RenderCell, Sea, SimpleEntity, UserControlledShooter, Weapon

    public interface Renderable
    Interface for objects whether they are blocks and entities.

    • Method Detail

      • getLightlevelR

        float getLightlevelR()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • getLightlevelG

        float getLightlevelG()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • getLightlevelB

        float getLightlevelB()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • setLightlevel

        void setLightlevel(float lightlevel)
        Set the brightness of the object. The lightlevel is a scaling factor. 1 is default value.
        Parameters:
        lightlevel - 1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • render

        void render(GameView view,
            Camera camera)
        Draws an object if it is not hidden and not clipped.
        Parameters:
        view - the view using this render method
        camera - The camera rendering the scene

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Return the coordinates of the object in the game world. Not copy safe.
        Returns:
        Reference to the position object which points to the location in the game world.
        See Also:
        getPoint()
